data.author: Bronstrup Creative

changelog.release_notes:
FIXES: Full weekdays didn't fit with full months, so those are abbreviated now.  

NEW FEATURES: Configuration to allow for polling of shipping status for your Kickstarter-backed Pebble Time and/or Pebble Time Steel. Polling is done through my server every 5 minutes (yes, that means you need to trust me).

Readability improvements - Changed hand colors on Pebble Time and increased font size. Updated look of compass, battery bar, and bluetooth icon. One-second mode now remains active for a full minute, making the compass much more useful.

New features!

Added a compass (left), battery level indicator (middle), and bluetooth connection indicator (right) to the bottom of this face.

To conserve battery, each indicator only updates when the face updates. That means once per minute under normal conditions or once per second for 10 seconds after tapping the screen or switching to this face.

Compass - Arrow always points north. Arrow is solid when pointing to magnetic north and empty when pointing toward true north (this is based on whether your Pebble is able to identify true north).

Battery indicator - The battery level is displayed as a filled bar, red on Pebble Time, black on Pebble. When charging, the 100% area is outlined, dark red on Pebble Time, black on Pebble.

Bluetooth indicator - Only appears when connected, hidden otherwise.
Fixed off-center center dot and changed dot from filled square to drawn circle. Also re-alighned hands slightly.

Initial release.

Are you a member of Team Null, Pebble's unofficial "My Pebble Time Kickstarter Reward Tracking Number is Stuck as NULL" fan club? This watch face is for you!

It's in both black and white AND color, so you can use it today and, if you like it, keep using it when your Time finally arrives!

Features:
Battery-saver second hand - The second hand displays for 10 seconds when the watch is tapped on; after that, the face reverts to minutes-only mode to conserve battery.
Group acceptance and recognition - Immediately identify yourself to other Pebblers as someone who backed the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign and has yet to receive their Pebble Time or, once you *do* get your Time, as one of the few, the proud, the... wait no, I can't use that, lest I find myself in military court... the many, the impatient, the NULL.

data.description:
Are you a member of Team Null, Pebble's unofficial "My Pebble Time Kickstarter Reward Tracking Number is Stuck as NULL" fan club? This watch face is for you!

Features:
 - Kickstarter NULL tracking - Checks every 5 minutes to see if your Time or Time Steel tracking number has appeared in your portal yet!
 - Compass - Arrow always points north. Arrow is solid when pointing to magnetic north and empty when pointing toward true north (this is based on whether your Pebble is able to identify true north).
 - Battery indicator - The battery level is displayed as a red bar. When charging, the 100% area is outlined in dark red.
 - Bluetooth indicator - Only appears when connected, hidden otherwise.
 - Battery-saver mode - The second hand displays and the compass, battery indicator, and bluetooth indicator are updated every second for 60 seconds when the watch is tapped on the face is activated; after that, the face reverts to minutes-only mode to conserve battery.
 - Group acceptance and recognition - Immediately identify yourself to other Pebblers as someone who backed the Pebble Time Kickstarter campaign and has yet to receive their Pebble Time or, once you *do* get your Time, as one of the few, the proud, the... wait no, I can't use that, lest I find myself in military court... the many, the impatient, the NULL.
